column1: For these reasons, you may have trouble knowing when your baby has diarrhea.
Your baby may have diarrhea if you see changes in his stool, such as: - More stools all of a sudden;
Your baby could also have diarrhea with: - A change in your baby's diet or a change in the mother's diet if breastfeeding.
Your baby will need to take antibiotics to get better.
